lead_paragraph: The attack, which occurred just before 6 a.m. on Wednesday, left the woman with a gash around her lip that required seven stitches.

headline.print_headline: Man Arrested After Woman Is Slashed Across Face
headline.main: Bronx Man Charged With Slashing a Woman in Chelsea

snippet: The attack, which occurred just before 6 a.m. on Wednesday, left the woman with a gash around her lip that required seven stitches.
abstract: New York City Police announce arrest of Kari Bazemore of Bronx for felony assault and criminal possession of weapon for allegedly slashing woman across face in Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan; authorities are looking into whether Bazemore was behind several similar slashings in city.
